name: Scavenger
description:
The Scavenger, an adolescent form of the Warrior, sits at the bottom of the Terminid food chain and is ubiquitous across various planets and difficulty levels.
Though individually weak and largely harmless, Scavengers can become surprisingly dangerous when encountered in packs. A Helldiver caught amidst a group of these creatures may find them more threatening than initially anticipated. Additionally, if given the opportunity, Scavengers can release a cloud of Pheromone Spores, signaling the presence of hostiles to other nearby Terminids.

name: Warrior
description:
The Warrior represents the evolutionary advancement from the Scavenger and precedes the transformation into a Brood Commander, appearing at any difficulty level.
These entities move at a moderate pace and attack exclusively with their razor-sharp claws.
